title: Do they know it's Christmas?
creator_credit: PolyGram Music Video, Dave Bridges and Rob Wright
brief_description: Documentary music video presenting an inside look at some of the world’s leading rock bands from the UK and the US as they come together as “Band Aid” to produce the song “Do they know it’s Christmas?” to raise funds for the starving victims of Ethiopia. Members of “Band Aid” include Bob Geldoff, Bono, Midge Ure, David Bowie, Paul McCartney, George Michael, Boy George and many more.
